CustomField.formula: IF(AND( ISPICKVAL( Partner_Status__c , 'Active' ) , NOT( ISPICKVAL( Partner_Status__c , 'None'))), HYPERLINK('/apex/DeactivateVendorPage?id=' & Id , IMAGE("/resource/1298546011000/DeactivateButton", ' Deactivate'), '_parent' ) , IF( AND( ISPICKVAL( Partner_Status__c , 'Inactive' ) , NOT( ISPICKVAL( Partner_Status__c , 'None'))), HYPERLINK('/apex/ActivateVendorPage?id=' & Id , IMAGE("/resource/1298546011000/ActivateButton",' Activate'), '_parent' ),' ' ))
CustomField.label: Available action
